definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The new tax regulations came into effect last year.
sentences.chinese: 新税法去年已开始实施。

sentences.english: Tax laws prohibit a partner from automatically inheriting anindividual retirement account without paying taxes.
sentences.chinese: 税法禁止伴侣无需纳税，自动继承个人退休收入。

sentences.english: The council discussed the proposed law on taxes.
sentences.chinese: 委员会讨论了所提的税法议案。

sentences.english: A new system of taxation will come into effect next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 新税法体系将于下个星期一开始实施。

sentences.english: Clause 21. The design unit shall pay taxes in accordance with the stipulations of Chinese tax law.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一条设计单位应依照我国税法规定，交纳税费。

sentences.english: The newspaper attacked the new tax .
sentences.chinese: 报纸对新税法进行了抨击。

sentences.english: Mister Clinton also supported unpopular new taxes.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿还支持不大受欢迎的新税法。

sentences.english: The second part is about tax legalism of china tax law .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是我国税法中的税收法定主义评析。

sentences.english: Congress has enacted a new tax law.
sentences.chinese: 国会已颁布了一项新的税法。

sentences.english: Shrill protests about the new taxes filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 广播中充斥着对新税法的尖锐抗议。

sentences.english: The parliament took the president's tax policy under advisement and denied it.
sentences.chinese: 国会对总统的税法政策进行考虑后否决了。

sentences.english: Prices were bumped up at news of changes in the income tax laws .
sentences.chinese: 改变所得税法的消息传来，各种东西突然涨价了。

sentences.english: The new tax law will not take effect until next month.
sentences.chinese: 新税法要到下个月才开始生效。

sentences.english: INTRODUTION OF INTERNATIONAL TAX LAW is a branch of international economic law.
sentences.chinese: 国际税法是国际经济法的分支学科。

sentences.english: Betty: Hi, these days I am learing law of tax.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，这些天我正在学习税法。

sentences.english: The senator argued with the President about the new tax bill.
sentences.chinese: 参议员与总统为新税法案争辩。

definition: personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
